segments.text: I am not convinced by your explanation . Could you explain it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I really can't do that . There's little time left for us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't accept your excuse . It's five o'clock .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I have an appointment with Ann .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , sounds good . But I think it's your trick .
segments.speaker: S1
